Haikus

Published:
March 11, 2013

ΣΦΕ

Fresh­men mop the floors

Too loud, each Bro is blasting

Tity Boi 2 Chainz

Odegaard Under­grad­u­ate Library and Learn­ing Commons, Main Floor

Cannot poop in here

A Mormon followed me in

Now learn­ing ’bout Christ
